TFirebirdSQLGenerator.GetSQLTableExists(string) Method

Summary

Constructs a query which checks if given table exists in the database. Query which executes returned statement should return 0 or raise an exception if table does not exist and > 0 when it exists.

Namespace: Spring.Persistence.SQL.Generators.Firebird
Syntax
Delphi

 function GetSQLTableExists(const tableName: string): string; override;
